pages.text: The wishes for rain can now come true!$(br)Behold! For it's an occultist's work.$(br2)This rite will either need $(l:shaping/entry_lightning)Tangible Lightning$() for thunder, $(l:alchemy/entry_flesh_lamb)Flesh of the Lamb$() for rain, or $(l:alchemy/entry_sparks_brightest)Brightest Sparks$() for sunshine nearby.$(br)Upon completion, this ingredient will be consumed.
